ValidationRule.description: Prevents customers whose account is marked as delinquent from selecting annual or monthly payments
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.Global_Automation_Settings__c.Skip_Validation_Rule__c), !( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), SBQQ__Account__r.MM_Delinquent__c = TRUE, Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', OR( TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c) = 'Direct Annual', TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c) = 'Direct Monthly' ) ) && TEXT(Configuration_Segment__c) != "Express"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Delinquent accounts are not eligible for Direct Annual or Direct Monthly payments.
